attributes.action: nationalise all public travel and to make free access as a cheaper alternative to road taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By improving and allowing free access to railways and buses/coaches there would be no need to use a car in the cities or on long journeys.  This is a cost effective alternative to a high tech solution that will cost billions to create, manage and run.  
If you look at all the current software systems created by HM you will note that not one works correctly.  
Please petition here as a viable alternative to the car spy.
